member.name: F:UrlMatcher.Matcher.Logger
member.summary: Method to invoke to send log messages. It's really boring, but if you want to see it, assign Console.WriteLine to it.

member.name: M:UrlMatcher.Matcher.Match(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String}@)
member.summary: Match a URL against a pattern. For example, match URL /v1.0/something/else/32 against pattern /{v}/something/else/{id}. If a match exists, vals will contain keys name 'v' and 'id', and the associated values from the supplied URL.
member.param: The pattern used to evaluate the URL.
